About this item

  • This highly concentrated solution is formulated with 3 types of vitamin C derivatives and coenzyme Q10 as well as many carefully selected ingredients
  • (3 Causes of Skin Damage) 1. Light Damage: Damage caused by UV rays and blue light damage 2. Active oxygen: Reduces skin cells due to air pollution and stress. For the cause of non-elastic skin. 3.Wrong skin care: Peeling, friction, synthetic surfactant and other delicate skin damage. The C serum provides support for skin problems caused by everyday use
  • What is Vitamin C care: Melamine pigments generate skin that has an aged impression due to dullness and UV damage. Vitamin C is easy to oxidize and very delicate. Just Vitamin C can't approach deep into your skin. C Serum uses vitamin C to prevent oxidation and remove active oxygen from the skin for younger skin
  • 3 Advanced Vitamin C derivatives: Vitamin C has excellent effect, while the concentration is too thick, it can cause skin dryness and irritation and cause skin irritation. Therefore, VIOTERAS C serum contains vitamin C derivatives with the optimal concentration of "10%" which has been tested many times. This serum is both strong and gentle
  • (Safe and Reliable Made in Japan) Made in a Japanese specialty factory with thorough hygiene management to ensure safe use for Japanese women. It has a smooth texture that does not feel sticky and does not have any smell common with vitamin C serum liquid
  • Contents: 0.7 fl oz (20 ml) / Approx. 1 month supply. The size fits in one hand, so it is convenient to carry around for sleepovers, etc

Important Message

Safety Information

Please use carefully for any skin abnormalities. Please do not use when your skin has more than a wound or eczema, or if it does not fit your skin. If red meat, swelling, itchiness, irritation, color loss (white spots), or dark spots etc. appear during or after use, please stop using and consult a dermatologist. Symptoms may deteriorate if used as is. In the event that it gets into your eyes, immediately rinse with cold or warm water. Please handle with clean hands, and do not return the product from the container to its original state. Please be sure to securely tighten the cap after use. Keep out of reach of infants. Store at room temperature away from extremely hot or cold temperatures or in direct sunlight. There may be discoloration, sediment, or turbidity, but this is not a quality problem. There may be some smell of the ingredients blended in this product, but this is not a quality problem. Please use it within a month after opening

Ingredients

Water, Ethoxydiglycol, DPG, 3-glyceryl ascorbic acid, glycerin, 3Na ascorbilic palmitate, ubinone, grapefruit fruit fruit oil, ethylhexyl glycerin, PEG-60 water based castor oil, K hydroxide

Product Description

The birth of the C-Serum is a new formula.

Formulated with 3 vitamin C derivatives.

Brightening Vitamin C derivative APPS Aging Care Type Vitamin C derivative Amitose 3GA Fast Penetrating Vitamin C derivative of moisturizing vitamin C derivatives.

It also contains Coenzyme Q10.

With a high concentration of ingredients containing 3 types of vitamin C derivatives, Coenzyme Q10, and these carefully selected ingredients, this product is a perfect approach to 6 major skin problems such as pores, sagging, dullness, skin rashes, wrinkles, and stains.

For those who grow up with age

For stains, wrinkles, rashes, pores, and sagging that grow with age as you age.

The cause of three damage over the age of the product.

Light Damage Activated Oxygen Incorrect Skin Care

Skin problems can lead to aging impression.

So it's important that it is continuous vitamin C care.

A triple blend of vitamin C derivatives that have been carefully selected.

Pursuing transparent skin.

Brightening Vitamin C has a mechanism that does not make melanin, traps melanin, and breaks down melanin for a fast approach with a triple action.Effective for blackhead pores, brightening effect, and stains.

100 times more penetration power

APPS (excier) is an advanced vitamin C derivator that uses both a highly effective water soluble and oil soluble with high penetration power.Its penetration power is more than 100 times more than a water-soluble vitamin C.APPS penetrate the stratum of the skin to the corners of the skin for immediate results.

A multi-directional approach because it is specifically designed for anti-aging.

The Amitose 3GA has a water retention power that exceeds glycerin in in addition to its previously melanin production and promotes collagen growth.It is also formulated with vitamin C derivatives that are "10%" with the optimal concentration produced after many tests.

A highly concentrated solution serum with attention to ingredients and quality.

30 times more antioxidant

Coenzyme Q10 can be used alone with high oxidation power, but it also increases power by combining it with the compatible Vitamin C derivatives.The synergy effect is increased by 30 times for improved skin problems.

6. Firmly approach to major skin problems.

This highly concentrated solution is formulated with 3 types of vitamin C derivatives and a generous amount of carefully selected ingredients of Coenzyme Q10 to support skin care.With this single product, it provides a firm and powerful approach to 6 major skin problems: stains, pores, wrinkles, sagging, skin irritation, and dullness.

Rigorous Quality Control

A highly concentrated solution that is safe for sensitive skin with a generous amount of ingredients that have been formulated to eliminate any excess ingredients.In addition, it is manufactured in a safe domestic factory with thorough quality control to ensure consistent quality.
